string.name: no_sessions_available
string.translation_description: Alternative label for the session list screen when there are no sessions

string.name: search_hint
string.translation_description: A placeholder text shown at the search box of I/O sessions.

string.name: search_settings_description
string.translation_description: The explanation shown on the search screen of I/O sessions.

string.name: session_detail_speakers_header
string.translation_descriptions: The label for the session speakers.

string.name: session_detail_star
string.translation_descriptions: The label for the button to star a session.

string.name: session_detail_watch
string.translation_descriptions: The label for the button to start watching a recording/livestream session.
